General.Name: Livermore Investments Group Limited
General.Description: Livermore Investments Group Limited is a publicly owned investment manager. The firm primarily invests in fixed income instruments such as Collateralized Loan Obligations ("CLOs"). The company, formerly Empire Online Limited, was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Road Town, British Virgin Islands.
General.Address: Trident Chambers, Road Town, British Virgin Islands

1.Name: Mr. Ron  Baron
1.Title: Chief Investment Officer and Exec. Director
